text:
Hey, Juri……
did something good happen on stage?

Huh? Haha...
did it show on my face?
──When I was on stage with everyone, I thought

With this monochrome costume,
everyone's shine stands out.

I thought maybe Producer
considered that too.

Haha... I see...
I'm glad you think that way.

I want to hear all of Juri's feelings
──because that's surely a hint to what makes you Juri.

I see...
but I'm not really good at putting it into words myself──

Maybe it's because Producer notices things
like this that I can find out more about myself.
